trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of namespace objects.
This class cannot be inherited.
The NamespaceCollection contains <xref:System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo> objects.
Each <xref:System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo> object is the same as an `Import` (`<%@ Import %>`) directive that applies to all pages and controls in the scope of the configuration file.
The `Import` directive allows you to import a namespace into your ASP.NET page, making all its classes available for use on your page.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceCollection"></xref> class.
Adds a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref> object to the collection.
The collection must not already contain a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo> object with the same <xref:System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo.Namespace%2A> property value.
A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref> object to add to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref> object to add already exists in the collection or the collection is read-only.
Gets or sets a value that determines whether the Visual Basic namespace is imported without having to specify it.
For ASP.NET pages written using Visual Basic the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic> namespace is automatically imported unless the AutoImportVBNamespace property is `false`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Visual Basic namespace is imported automatically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Removes all <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref> objects from the collection.

This method empties the collection and inserts a `clear` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file to remove all references to elements defined in higher-level configuration files and in the current configuration file.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
This property overwrites the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo> object if it already exists at the specified index; otherwise, a new object is created and added to the collection.
The index of a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref> object in the collection.
<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref> object at the specified index, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no object at that index.
To be added.
Removes the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref> object with the specified key from the collection.

If the specified element is defined in a higher-level configuration file, this method inserts a `remove` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file at the level of the current application.
If the element is defined in the current configuration file, its entry is removed from the configuration file.
The object to remove must exist in the collection; if it does not, a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException> is thrown.
The namespace of a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
Removes a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProfileGroupSettings"></xref> object from the specified index in the collection.

If the specified element is defined in a higher-level configuration file, this method inserts a `remove` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file at the level of the current application.
If the element is defined in the current configuration file, its entry is removed from the configuration file.
The object to remove must exist in the collection; if it does not, a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException> is thrown.
The index of a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
